name: Runicorns
description:
Mystic unicorns from air, land and sea.

You have to travel as far as possible between kingdoms with the corresponding unicorn.

A horse to the cave, a narwhal to the sea, a dragon to the sky.

Game develop for the Summer Slow Jams July 2019: 3-Button, 3-Color Games.


Click on these adorable buttons  above or use the num pad.
